ko: 걔 상 받으려고 할 수 있는 건 다 했어.

en: He did everything he could to get the prize.
ko: 걔 상 받으려고 온갖 노력을 다 했어.

en: He worked hard in order to get the prize.
ko: 걔 상 받으려고 진짜 열심히 했어.

en: He feels the prize to be the superior.
He is proud of having won the prize.
ko: 걔 상 받은 거 엄청 자랑스러워해.

en: He deserves the prize.
He reported the details with accuracy.
He affirmed that he saw the crash.
ko: 걔가 그 사고 본 거 확실하대.

en: He has sent the boy on an errand.
He calls the boy Tom.
He looked into the boy's eyes.
He gave the boy what little money he had.
ko: 걔가 그 애한테 가진 돈 다 줬어.

en: He provided the boys with food, clothing and shoes.
ko: 걔가 애들한테 먹을 거랑 옷이랑 신발을 챙겨줬어.

en: He seems to be very fond of the boy.
ko: 걔 그 애를 진짜 아끼는 것 같아.

en: He saw the boy jump over the fence and run away.
ko: 걔가 그 애가 담장 넘어서 도망가는 거 봤어.

en: He adopted this little girl.
He stole a glance at the girl.
He praised the girl for her honesty.
He played the girl a piece of music of his own writing.
ko: 걔가 자기가 직접 쓴 곡을 그 여자애한테 연주해 줬어.

en: He played a tune for the girl that he'd written himself.
ko: 걔가 직접 작곡한 곡을 그 여자애한테 들려줬어.

en: He feigned indifference to the girl.
ko: 걔 그 여자애한테 관심 없는 척했어.

en: He was able to get along on the small amount of money.
ko: 걔 그 적은 돈으로도 잘 버텼어.

en: He tied the parcel up.
It took him three years to write the novel.
ko: 걔 그 소설 쓰는 데 3년 걸렸어.

en: He won fame by the novel.
He rose to his feet to protect the people in the small town.
ko: 걔가 작은 마을 사람들을 지키려고 일어섰어.

en: He applied for the scholarship.
He centered his business on the metropolitan area.
He made money from that business.
ko: 걔 그 사업으로 돈 좀 벌었어.

en: He believed the merchant entirely.
He made the actress his wife.
He excluded the woman from the suspects.
He is enchanted by the girl's beauty.
ko: 걔는 그 여자애 미모에 홀딱 반했어.

en: He got the lady some water.
ko: 걔가 그 여자분한테 물을 좀 갖다 줬어.

en: When he met the lady, he raised his hat.
ko: 걔는 그 여자분을 만났을 때 모자를 들어 인사했어.

en: He has given up trying to put the papers in order.
ko: 걔 서류 정리하는 거 이제 포기했어.

en: He had access to the papers.
ko: 걔가 그 서류들을 볼 수 있었어.

en: He exclaimed that I should not touch the gun.
ko: 걔가 나보고 총 만지지 말라고 소리쳤어.

en: He seems not to have realized its importance.
ko: 걔는 그게 얼마나 중요한지 모르는 것 같아.

en: He dismissed the employee.
He was convinced that he could make a success of the weekly magazine in the long run.
ko: 걔는 결국 그 주간지를 성공시킬 수 있을 거라고 확신했어.

en: He said that he was giving a party that week, and that I was invited to it.
ko: 걔가 이번 주에 파티 연다고 나보고 오라고 하더라.

en: He made every effort to get out of that habit.
ko: 걔 그 습관 고치려고 온갖 노력을 다 했어.

en: He was interviewed for the job, but couldn't get it.
He posed as a dentist at that bar.
ko: 걔 그 바에서 치과 의사인 척했어.

en: He is an expert at solving such problems.
ko: 걔 그런 문제 해결하는 데는 아주 도가 텄어.

en: He performed the trick with ease.
ko: 걔 그 묘기를 아주 쉽게 해내더라.

en: He may have read the letter.
Far from reading the letter, he did not even open it.
He circulated the letter among the members.
ko: 그는 멤버들한테 편지를 돌려 읽게 했어.
